name: cfsetting
description: Controls aspects of page processing, such as the output of content outside cfoutput tags.

params.name: enablecfoutputonly
params.description:
true: Blocks output of content that is outside cfoutput tags.
false: Displays content that is outside cfoutput tags.

params.name: showdebugoutput
params.description:
true: If debugging is enabled in the Administrator, displays
 debugging information
 false: suppresses debugging information that would otherwise
 display at end of generated page.

params.name: requesttimeout
params.description:
Integer; number of seconds. Time limit, after which
 CFML processes the page as an unresponsive thread.
 Overrides the timeout set in the CFML Administrator.

coldfusion.notes: CF10: Added the script syntax: setting.

examples.title: Script Syntax
examples.description: Set the request timeout to 30 seconds

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: Set the request timeout to 30 seconds
